title: Good Day
lyrics:
Iâ€™ll call today a good day
Bich-eul meogeum-eun deushan ne nun-eul bon sungan
(And I'm feeling good, and I'm feeling good)
Gyehoegdoen ilcheoleom binteum-eobs-i hollin deushae
(eungeunhan miso gibun joh-eun sign)



Feel good feel good

Nangmanjeog-in geu vibe

Feel luv feel luv

Ppajyeobeolil geos gat-a

Feel good feel good

Os saegkkalmajeo nae mam-e deul-eo

Uisimdoel mankeum perfect



You make me feel so fine

Neowa nal ulilago bulleobolkka Baby neoneun eottae

You make me feel so high

Hanaga doeeo nal-aboneun geoya oneul neoneun eottae



Woo hoo hoo hoo

Josimseule didneun good day

Woo hoo hoo hoo Woo hoo hoo hoo

Seololeul hyanghae didneun good day

Woo hoo hoo hoo



Oneul-eun nega joh-ahaneun slim hago

Lain-i saljjag bichineun os-eul ib-eoss-eo ye

Nega joh-ahaneun hyangsu deumppug ppulyeossgo

Neon oneuldo yeppeum-i eogim-eobs-eo woo ye

Neo geuttaegeuttae haessdeon mal-i gieogna

Ttag oneul gat-eun ileon nal-eul good daylago

Pyohyeonhago sipda malhaessjanh-a geuttaegeuttae



Feel good feel good

Sangsang sog-ui geu sign

Feel luv feel luv

Nawa gat-eul geos gat-a

Feel good feel good

Kkochhyang-gimajeo wanbyeoghae

Naega hal mal-i issneun deushae



You make me feel so fine

Neowa nal ulilago bulleobolkka Baby neoneun eottae

You make me feel so high

Hanaga doeeo nal-aboneun geoya oneul neoneun eottae



Sujub-eo boyeodo nae mal-eun hwagsilhae

Josimseule malhaedo nae ma-eum-eul nan hwagsinhae

Nal midgo ttalawa nae pum-e neoleul matgyeodo dwae

Oneulboda joh-eun nal-eun eobs-eul geoya



You and me, me and you

Oneul-eul gijeog-ila bulleobolkka Baby neoneun eottae

You and me, me and you

Neowa nalaseo wanbyeoghaejin oneul jigeum neoneun eottae



Woo hoo hoo hoo

Josimseule didneun good day

Woo hoo hoo hoo Woo hoo hoo hoo

Seololeul hyanghae didneun good day

Woo hoo hoo hoo
